nodes.text: Jarea was a female Human who lived at the time of the Galactic Civil War. She owned a varactyl which she used as a mount on the planet Kashyyyk.

This character's only appearance is in a screenshot of Star Wars Galaxies: Rage of the Wookiees. The image was published in Star Wars Galaxies: The Complete Guide: Prima Official Game Guide and later reprinted in Star Wars Galaxies: The Total Experience: Prima Official Game Guide.
